case.name: Vijayakumar v Qantas Airways Ltd [2009] FCA 1121 (2 October 2009)

citances.sentence: An appeal was dismissed in Moran v Lydiard Financial Services Pty Ltd [2007] FCA 872 , in which Riley FM's findings in para.43 of Lydiard were not dealt with. [18] Vijayakumar v Qantas Airways Limited [2009] FMCA 736 ; (2009) 233 FLR 369 at 375 per Scarlett FM; [2009] FMCA 736 at para.42 per Scarlett FM (" Vijayakumar "). An application for leave to appeal Vijayakumar was dismissed by the Federal Court in Vijayakumar v Qantas Airways Limited [2009] FCA 1121 , in which Scarlett FM's finding in para.43 of Vijayakumar was not disturbed. [19] SZGTE at para.34 per Graham J. [20] Donnelly v Prentice [2003] FMCA 50.
